title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on a device that supports multitasking (OS 7.x and up)
(test for handset & tablet)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Scoreboard
and attempts to split the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the device's screen should split without issue
and the app should not crash
and the user should be able to navigate through the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Scoreboard
and has the screen split
and attempts to change the size of the At Bat part of the screen 
(make bigger or smaller)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the app should not crash
and the user should still be able to navigate through the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
